chest-dialog.chest_empty: It seems that someone has entered this labyrinth.

dark-map.on-dead: Nope!!!!, I forgot the traps scattered everywhere!!!
dark-map.text: Where the treasure is, I must find it!!, I can find treasure, by looking at it from a slightly different side of the world.

light-map.text: Feels a little tight, I can't stay long in this unreal world.
